Hero.name: Jeremy Misola
Hero.title: A Living DevOps Portfolio
Hero.subtitle: This website is a live demonstration of my cloud-native skills, running on a Kubernetes cluster I built, automated, and monitor.

About.title: Building Resilient, Scalable Systems.
About.subtitle: Computer Science Student
About.description: Hello! I'm a final-year Computer Science student with a deep passion for DevOps principles. I am seeking a challenging role where I can leverage my skills in Kubernetes, infrastructure automation, and CI/CD to build and maintain the highly available, resilient backbone that modern applications require.

automation.title: Automation First
automation.description: I strive to automate everything from CI/CD pipelines to infrastructure provisioning, reducing manual effort and ensuring repeatable consistency.

iac.title: Infrastructure as Code
iac.description: I treat infrastructure as a software project, defining and managing its state with code to enable versioning, peer review, and full transparency.

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work, including cloud-native applications, infrastructure automation, and DevOps solutions.
Projects.no_projects: No projects available at the moment.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: My journey in DevOps and cloud-native technologies.

gitops.title: GitOps & CI/CD
gitops.description: The automated GitOps workflow with ArgoCD.

cluster.title: Live Kubernetes Cluster
cluster.description: An interactive map of the K3s cluster this portfolio runs on.

monitoring.title: Live Monitoring
monitoring.description: See real-time performance metrics from Prometheus & Grafana.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A showcase of my recent work and portfolio projects.

provisioning.title: Ansible Provisioning
provisioning.description: How the cluster nodes were configured with Ansible.

Ansible.title: Automating Server Administration with Ansible
Ansible.subtitle: After provisioning VMs with Terraform, Ansible handles ongoing server administration tasks like user management and system updates.

hardening.title: System Hardening
hardening.description: Run system-wide updates to keep servers patched and secure.

management.title: User Management
management.description: Easily add new administrative users with SSH access.

addUser.title: On-Demand User Creation
addUser.description: This playbook prompts for a username and a public SSH key to create a new sudo-enabled user on all servers, simplifying access management.

updateServers.title: Centralized System Updates
updateServers.description: Run this simple playbook to update the package cache and upgrade all packages on every server in your inventory.

GitOps.title: My DevOps Workflow
GitOps.subtitle: An inside look into the architecture and processes that build and deploy this website.

commits.title: Commit Activity Over Time
commits.description: Weekly commit frequency in the repository.

pullRequests.title: Pull Request Analysis
pullRequests.description: The current state of all PRs.

coverage.title: Code Coverage Trend
coverage.description: Test coverage percentage over the last six months.

frequency.title: Build & Deployment Frequency
frequency.description: Number of builds and successful deployments per month.

durations.title: Recent Build Durations
durations.description: Average build time in seconds for recent commits.

health.title: Deployment Health & Quality
health.description: A multi-factor health score for the latest deployment pipeline.

Monitoring.title: Live Operations Dashboard
Monitoring.subtitle: This dashboard provides a real-time view into the application's live performance and infrastructure health, served by a Go meta-API.

activePod.title: Active Pod
activePod.tooltip: Pod & Node info from the K8s Downward API.

health.title: Application Health
health.tooltip: Overall health based on uptime and error rate.

traffic.title: API Endpoint Traffic
traffic.description: Distribution of API calls by endpoint.

resource.title: Live Resource Utilization
resource.description: CPU and Memory usage for the running pod.

errorBudget.title: Error Budget Burn
errorBudget.description: Fast (1h) vs Slow (6h) burn rates. Watch for spikes over 2x.

uptime.title: Synthetic Uptime
uptime.description: Last 7 days uptime by region (HTTP check).

alerts.title: Alert Volume by Severity
alerts.description: Distribution of Alerts fired this week.

events.title: Live Kubernetes Event Stream
events.description: A real-time feed of events from the 'production' namespace.

KubernetesCluster.title: Live Cluster Explorer
KubernetesCluster.subtitle: This is a live, read-only view of the Kubernetes infrastructure serving this very page.

activePod.title: Active Pod
